title: CfSM
description: An innovative service that will replace the traditional road monitoring system

section1.title: Capture
section1.description:
Capture enough data to create 
a dataset using the drone.
The data type must be in image format.

section2.title: Combine
section2.description:
Combine the tile dataset into
one whole road image for the preparation of data processing.

section3.title: Process
section3.description:
Process the dataset through CfSM solution to get rid of car/shadow images from the road. 

The successful result would have a clear road without any distortion.

section4.title: Monitor
section4.description:
Monitor the status of the road using CfSM processed image. 

Detect the condition of the road by running an analysis on the server.
